original_text: They argued about it with each other. When they began to leave the house, Paul said, ‘The Holy Spirit spoke a true message to your ancestors. He gave this message to Isaiah, the prophet:
korean_text: 서로 맞지 아니하여 흩어질 때에 바울이 한 말로 이르되 성령이 선지자 이사야를 통하여 너희 조상들에게 말씀하신 것이 옳도다

sentences.original_text: They argued about it with each other.
When they began to leave the house,
The Holy Spirit spoke a true message
He gave this message to Isaiah, the prophet:
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 메시지를 선지자 이사야에게 주었습니다:
